verbs.description: WASHINGTON • [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: late Friday] [ARG1: he had allowed embattled Chinese telecommunications giant ZTE Corp. to remain open despite fierce bipartisan opposition on Capitol Hill , defying lawmakers who]
